TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PropertyFilterOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies which properties should be reported by type descriptors, specifically the method. This enumeration is used to specify the value of the property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This filter mechanism is only implemented by the custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor> for <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
Invalid and Valid are relevant only for attached properties. The validity of a property is determined by working with the following attributes: <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForChildrenAttribute> , <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute>, <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableWhenAttributePresentAttribute> which define the intended scope of the attached property in the object tree once the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is loaded. Designer applications that populate property grids and include attached properties in the grid must examine the value or presence of these attributes and the relative position of the current element versus either a parent or child element that "owns" the attached property. The owner-setter relationship together with the attribute values and <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> will define whether a given attached property that is set on an element is valid or invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions All = int32(15)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions Invalid = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Return only those properties that are not valid given the current context of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions SetValues = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Return only those properties that have local values currently set.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions UnsetValues = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Return only those properties whose local values are not set, or do not have properties set in an external expression store (such as binding or deferred resource).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions Valid = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Return any property that is valid on the object in the current scope.
